text:
Misuse of Drugs Order 2002

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 40(3) of the Misuse of Drugs Act 2001 .

23 September 2002

G. S. M. Green

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

Judy Jackson

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Misuse of Drugs Order 2002 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3.
The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the Misuse of Drugs Act 2001 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 October 2002

This order is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
